name: GO BACK TO HELL (PirateSloop)
description:
One bold guy, one old gun, and a lot of annoying enemies.

A small arena-based 2-d top-down shooter focusing on survival mode style gameplay. 

Destroy the fire portal, kill enemies, survive waves of monsters.

Enemies spawn while the portal won’t be destroyed. 

  • W, A, S, D - to move
  • LEFT MOUSE - to shoot
  • SPACE-BAR - to punch
  • ESC – settings

     G – activates immortality, just in case if you need it :)
